Articles.Content:
These are just some remarks I want to submit:

- there should be a key to immediately reset time warp (like with thrust)

- flags should not be considered as "flights in progress"

- only if possible, could you develop an external support which extra science data can be stored in? (which we can unlock at the very end of career)

- there should be a key to immediately reset time warp (like with thrust)

Suggested every month or so: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/50055-one-button-that-kills-ALL-time-acceleration?highlight=timewarp

this will wake the kraken and increase the chance for the rocket to explode.

- flags should not be considered as "flights in progress"

Same thing, suggested about a month ago http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/47612-Remove-flags-from-Flights-in-Progress-at-save-load-menu?highlight=flight+progress

I think flights is a wrong use of words from Squad

- only if possible, could you develop an external support which extra science data can be stored in? (which we can unlock at the very end of career)

Should be easily moddable using the ModuleScienceContainer module. If only we could transfer reports from one container to another (it has been suggested too)

- only if possible, could you develop an external support which extra science data can be stored in? (which we can unlock at the very end of career)
